description: Simple tool for convert static paramters to dygraph paramters dict.NOTE The model must both support static graph and dygraph mode.model (nn.Layer) – the model of a neural network.static_tensor_dict (string) – path of which locate the saved paramters in static mode.Usualy load by paddle.static.load_program_state.a state dict the same as the dygraph mode.[tensor dict]

params.name: model
params.description: the model of a neural network.

params.name: static_tensor_dict
params.description: path of which locate the saved paramters in static mode.Usualy load by paddle.static.load_program_state.

return.description: a state dict the same as the dygraph mode.
